about_the_game:
Raptor Boyfriend: A High School Romance is a dating sim about a teen girl who moves to a small secret community of cryptids. Romance a magical Fairy, a sensitive Sasquatch and a bold Velociraptor. A satirical 90's teen drama about trying to find love in your last year of high school.



Experience the first episode of Raptor Boyfriend: A High School Romance: Welcome to Ladle! Meet the cryptid crushes you will romance on the first day of senior year, then call them afterschool to learn more about them before going to the most popular hang-out spot, "The Lake".



This demo features several branching choices and the ability to achieve the first collectible as well as bonus scenes for Day, Robert and Taylor.

Are you ready to start your Raptor Boyfriend story?

Are you ready to start your Raptor Boyfriend story?

fullgame.name: Raptor Boyfriend: A High School Romance

name: Raptor Boyfriend Demo
short_description: A visual novel dating-sim about finding love and friendship with a magical fairy, a loner sasquatch and a dare-devil velociraptor. Features branching paths, player choices and bonus scenes in this satirical, yet heartfelt, story-rich game!
